# ExESS API -- Cartesian Coordinates 
Vectors defining a position or a velocity in a cartesian coordinate system and in cartesian 
elements, like the one shown in Eq. \eqref{eq:cartesian_coordinate} are implemented as 
[`GlobalCartesianPosition`](/api/base/cs.qmd) and [`GlobalCartesianVelocity`](/api/base/cs.qmd).  
:::
